pages.text: Charm is a Quark-inspired mod that adds a few neat blocks and items. Here are a few of its features.
These Flesh Blocks will actually slightly boost the growth of crops if they are placed under farmland.

pages.title: Coffee
pages.text: Coffee, brewed with just cocoa beans and water, will give you a quick burst of speed and strength.
If you manage to capture a bat with a bucket, releasing it will give you sight of all mobs nearby. Very useful for finding caves.

pages.title: Music Discs
pages.text: Music Discs that play Minecraft's normal soundtrack can be found in the same way that vanilla music discs can (by a creeper being killed by a skeleton).
Endermite Powder may drop from Endermites and can help you locate End Cities when used in The End.

pages.title: Trade Renewal
pages.text: Shift-right-clicking a villager while holding an emerald block will renew its trades.
Full Charm documentation is here. Please not that some features may be tweaked or disabled in Immense.
